summary: An ordinance adopting a plan for co-ordinating the benefits accruing to members of the City Employees' Retirement System with the basic protection of Federal Old Age and Survivors Insurance; amending Sections 5 and 14 of Ordinance No. 78444 in connection therewith and requesting the Governor of the State of Washington to approve said plan and authorize a referendum thereon by the eligible employees of the City of Seattle.
